text: HC ZNTU-ZAB Zaporozhye is a Ukrainian men's handball club based in Zaporozhye played in the Ukrainian Men's Handball Super League. It took part in the 2016–17 EHF Challenge Cup. ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
